section.heading: Hatchery trout and domestic or imported foreign game in sealed containers

content.p:
ยง 11-1727. Hatchery trout and domestic or imported foreign game in
 sealed containers.
 Trout raised in a private hatchery under permit from the department or
outside the state under certificate pursuant to section 11-1715, and
carcasses or parts thereof of processed imported foreign game and
domestic game, packed within or without the state in sealed containers,
may be imported, transported, exported, bought and sold at any time. No
person in this state shall possess, transport, import, export, buy or
sell any such trout, imported game or domestic game in a sealed
container unless such container shall bear a label describing the
contents and the name of the person by whom processed.
